website_summaries.verdict: This crib skirt is a good choice for customers looking for a delicate fabric and feminine look.
pros: Measures 28 inches by 52 inches with a 16-inch drop
cons: Skirt is thinner and more delicate than it appears in the photo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, must have!! $ well spent!
customer_reviews.text: The tulle is not thin as other reviews state. There is a white under piece behind it so its not completely see through(refer to pics). It looks and feels perfect, not cheaply made at all! Best deal and money well spent! A must have , dont hesitate because of a bad review. It is a must buy!! Pics do not give this justice. Long enough for the crib on its highest mattress setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not tulle fabric, it's more of a mesh mosquito netting fabric. It is very disappointing, not nearly as pretty (or at all) as the picture, I wouldn't recommend even if was half this price.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but doesn't look as great as the picture. I was going to return it and get a solid white ruffle instead but the company wanted me to pay for shipping and a restocking fee and I just figured it wasn't worth it in the end. It doesn't look terrible but it wasn't what I had expected with seeing the photo here online.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Just received in the mail yesterday and already put it on my crib. I ordered it in pink and I love how it looks. Very happy I chose to ignore some of the negative reviews that almost stopped me from purchasing. It fit perfectly and it does a nice job of hiding all the empty space under the mattress and perhaps a few items I may store under there later.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It was a little more shear than I was expecting but it's not bad. The material seems good and fit well on the crib. It did seem slightly wrinkled but I'm hoping the wrinkles fall out as it hangs there.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McLeroy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable !
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute!!! Unfortunately I couldn't use it with the type of crib I have. I didn't realize that there wasnt much space between the floor and bottom of the crib, and the way its designes there are bars blocking it from fitting properly. It is very cute though !
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlyn smith

customer_reviews.title: cute but...
customer_reviews.text: tears so easily! i gave a corner of it the gentlest tug to position it correctly, and a strip of tulle ripped off! still keeping it but once the baby can crawl, it's a goner.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I really do like it but I feel like if your not careful the sheet will rip very very easily...there were a few strings coming out and I had to cut off because if I were to pull them off the sheet would have come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dizela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old boy and a newborn baby girl. The bedroom they share is already decorated in a nautica theme. Not wanting to overtake my two year old boys room and make everything pink, I decided to just spruce up my baby girls crib. This gives the perfect amount of girl-ness without over powering the entire room with a princess feel. It fits the crib very well. I haven’t had any problems over the past four months I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ugly
customer_reviews.text: Ugly pink, not as the picture. Reminds me of Peptobismol. The material looks cheap. Awful customer service too, I bought these about 2 weeks ago and still haven't got the return instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Fido

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This tulle crib skirt is perfect for my nursery! It's so beautiful and airy. It reaches the floor even when the crib is on the highest setting. Exactly what I was looking for. I searched and it was hard to find a reasonably priced one. This one was a great price and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put this on our daughter's crib yet, as we just got the nursery furniture delivered. However, I did prewash it and when I pulled it out I was very happy with the quality. It looks very feminine and I didn't get the "mosquito net" vibe that others mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Scales

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected but still CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Not as full as it looked on here but otherwise it is still very cute and serves its purpose(hiding the under bed tote thats under my daughters crib). I would definitely recommend for anyone on a budget looking for this style. It seems decent enough quality to last a while. I mean it's a crib skirt so I cant really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Nice tulle skirt
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to pay a ton for a crib skirt, so this did the job and although the tulle part is thin as others had said, it has a thicker (if you can call it that) piece of fabric behind it (more like thin white fabric, but not see-through like the tulle) so it works out OK. It's also longer, which I wanted, but as I have the crib at the lowest setting, the tulle is hanging a bit on the floor. I still like the princess-y feel to it though and the quality seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: F Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good tulle skirt
customer_reviews.text: I like this skirt, but I'm not in love with this skirt. Moves around a lot and was kind of a pain in the butt to get inside the crib. It's also wrinkly and not quite on the ground, but it mostly looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Antonelli

customer_reviews.title: It’s long
customer_reviews.text: It was nice the material was not as still as i would have liked and it’s too long for the crib i purchased. It must be for a crip that has a higher setting
customer_reviews.author: A Loveall

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Too pricey for the quality . Received a decent ije in warehouse deal. But wouldn't suggest it for actual price
customer_reviews.author: Praneeth K Thaduvai

customer_reviews.title: I don’t expect this to make it to my child’s teen years.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these cribs because we are having twins. One of them arrived with a large crack. I have a wood working friend that can reinforce this and keep it from continuing to grow so I won’t have the hassle of sending it back. But I don’t expect it to last into their teen years with a crack this size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Color was a little off and I can see why other reviewers were mentioning it appeared blue. It is still pink by all means but does have a blue tint. For the price it's great. Better solution than the $95 one I was considering buying for my daughter's shabby chic princess nursery. Happy I went with this seeing as I had to remove the skirt when I put the mattress on the lowest level when she was 9mo.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: There are much better skirts if you only need a 13 inch drop
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 0 stars if I could. I looked really hard for a crib skirt that has a 16 inch drop. This one was sold that way, but what arrived is a skirt with a 13 inch drop. I never would have purchased this if I had known. There are much better skirts if you only need a 13 inch drop.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: great tulle crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: i am in love with my baby girls tulle crib skirt it looks amazing with her shabby chic inspired crib. it doesnt look cheap, looks very classy. i do not see any problems with the skirt
customer_reviews.author: ArmLuc

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help my new baby girls crib look great without having to buy the very expensive and useless crib set. As a second time mom I know that you don't use the bumper or blanket that come with the expensive set. The only thing they had in the baby store was either the expensive set or a 60$ crib skirt that I did not even like. This is perfect. It adds that girly light pink color and yes it has 4 sides just like the seller promises. Great find!! fast delivery! looks amazing after washing! Thank you so much! very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot. Went well with the curtains I had bought for the Nursery
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Tulle look!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! It’s more of a netted mesh but gives the fluffy look! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sbashir

customer_reviews.title: Pink and girly
customer_reviews.text: This item is really pretty. As someone else mentioned, it is a bit long when you have the crib in the lowest position, but because it is tiered, you can definitely still make it work by tucking the last tier under. I don't understand how some people think that it has lavender undertones. It is pink! But a very very very light pink. Perhaps if the background fabric were also pink instead of white, the color would be more like the one in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: natkaps

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. It's not a solid fabric like I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Adorable. It's not a solid fabric like I thought but a tulle. My bad didn't read closely - just ordered by looks. It is so so cute with the gauzy ruffles on her crib. Would look sweet in any little girl nursery.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for high level mattress setting
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty bed skirt. It is very much on the long side, so it is best for a crib at a higher setting. Once you lower the mattress level, it just bunches up and looks a little messy.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the crib skirt, the only down fall was how winky the skirt was. I am going to need to steam it to get all of the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Love the material and look, bit too long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's standard size crib. The tulle gives it that elegant princess look I was going for. The only thing I am worried about is that when I lower her mattress down when she gets older that it is going to be way too long. I say this because as of now I have it raised to the height for an infant and the skirt is already hanging on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Skbaby

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than what I expected! I purchased all white crib skirt. I thought it was going to be see through and ONLY 3 sided. It came with a silk liner attached and had all 4 sides! Very soft, glory, Has lots of volume, no wrinkles, Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Very cute skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful! I love it! Nice pink color, came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thin but pretty
customer_reviews.text: It looks cute. Seems very thin but it will do the job! I was disappointed that it was so thin. My mom sees and we will be adding another piece of plain white fabric behind the tulle. It already has a thin white piece behind the tulle but it is almost worthless. For the price it's worth keeping!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan C

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: works very well. it is a bit delicate though. Do not put on sharp corners or it will tear. Cute design too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's too cute, some people say its super thin, however it makes it look more soft and dainty! Glad I didn't listen to those reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany DeVillez

customer_reviews.title: This crib skirt was perfect for our twin girls cribs
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt was perfect for our twin girls cribs..easy to put on and is soft, feminine and just "frilly" enough to complement the soft pink nursery decor..very happy with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: LYNN A. BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! Looking for a light pink crib ruffle? This is it!! It's a bubble gum color, but not quite as bright as bubble gum.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Elegant! I use it as a canopy for my Delta Sophia Crib
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I wish I could take a picture and show you. I could not find canopy cloth so I wanted to be creative. I started to use crib skirt since no one can see the skirt. This particular design made my crib look so elegant. The theme is Princess so it works perfectly. I hope they make more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Davitrin

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in the pics but not in real life. Used it for my daughter's crib and the whole thing is too short and looks cheap. I didn't return it because I simply don't have the energy
customer_reviews.author: AMB3

customer_reviews.title: Crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this for the nursery. Once I ironed it and put it on the crib it was so pretty. It is very classy and elegant. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deana C Collins

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but did not fit our crib
customer_reviews.text: While the crib skirt was adorable, it did not fit the crib well. Unfortunately I will have to return it. PKP
customer_reviews.author: P. K. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, doesn’t fit in the corners very well of my daughters crib.
customer_reviews.author: M Duran

customer_reviews.title: Color is not bright pink
customer_reviews.text: Although this would be a great crib skirt, the item I received appears to be Rose gingham, instead of Bright Pink, and will not go with the other pinks I have in the room. I'm so disappointed and not sure I want to go through the hassle of returning a Warehouse item.
customer_reviews.author: meg85

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with how the crib skirt looks. It is very cute and fit my standard crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Athena G

customer_reviews.title: Crooked stitching
customer_reviews.text: Stitching was off and I didn’t catch it before my return window so I’m stuck with it. It doesn’t hang correctly. I ordered a different crib skirt from another seller. Also not as pretty or full as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkly-run through wash
customer_reviews.text: Item was wrinkled but it all came out when ran through the washer and dryer. Doesn't fluff out like I would have hoped, but very nice nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Classic
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt was the perfect touch for my daughter's pink and brown room! The pink color of the tulle matched my daughter's bedding perfectly; ours is not purple-ish, as some other reviewers have described. The tulle is high quality and seems durable. It does not look cheap at all. It is very cute and classic looking. I would recommend this adorable crib skirt for any little princess' room!
customer_reviews.author: SuperMegs

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Was a tiny bit shorter than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Was a tiny bit shorter than I expected and the skirt was very wrinkled but I'm sure after a first wash they will come out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: it is thin but for the price its great
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute for the bottom of the crib! makes the babys room look very soft. It allows for extra storage under the crib (diapers). it is thin but for the price its great
customer_reviews.author: tfoular

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when your crib is at its highest mattress setting but doesn't look as pretty when you lower it. I often slip on the bunched up fabric when putting my sleeping baby in her crib. Perhaps this would happen with all crib skirts?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty must be laid just right.
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty with just the perfect amount of "girlyness". It does need to be laid just right and is very light and airy.I have a rod iron crib and it does not fully cover the corners, but this may be more due to my crib type than the skirt. However, I do LOVE the look and it is just right if you want something feminine and not an overstated crib skirt.
customer_reviews.author: mdmcuriel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Went perfectly with the nursery theme. Exactly what I was looking for,
customer_reviews.author: NANCY FAVAZZA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our crib!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our crib! No, it's not the best material but it gets the job done and looks super cute. And it's a great price! I was concerned because a couple reviews stated that it was only 3-sided like a regular bed skirt but mine was 4-sided. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna B

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but the color pink was very different ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but the color pink was very different than what was shown and didn't match our nursery decor. It was a brighter, less traditional baby pink. We returned it with no issues and a fast refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price
customer_reviews.text: It had dog hair all in the tulle I kept it because of the price and washed it but it was disgusting when I first got it and it had to have been a former return of someone’s else’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib skirt. It's frilly and girly. It is a little darker shade of pink than picture shows, but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: LEFountain

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: Super cute crib skirt! Easy to put on and does exactly what I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: This skirt is very cute. It fits the new no drop side crib at the highest level perfectly but will be too long when you lower the mattress as the baby gets older. The pink color is a little lighter in person than the picture. The tulle is also a much lighter weight fabric than I expected but it looks great on my white crib. I really love this skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Not Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and love how they look, but did notice that they have a few small holes in them. They look like they rip easily, but I still love them because they really tie my little girls room all together and makes it look fit for a princess!
customer_reviews.author: R. DeMille

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not very full. I wish that it was double the fullness.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Núñez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very cheap material!!!! and not eve.. one side is longer
customer_reviews.author: Cas Putnam

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and was of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. It fit perfectly and was of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin4.0

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, looks really good under crib, and fit well. Didn’t touch floor also so it worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous crib skirt. Looks beautiful on my baby girl's crib!
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adds a softness to an otherwise badass Harry Potter themed nursery 😄
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great addition.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, isn't quite as full as it appears in photos - great, cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not ruffled like the picture at all, although after reading reviews was happy to find that it wasn't connected all the way around to accommodate going around corners but that cornered were separated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap...
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality. Will work, but definitely looks like a slip/underskirt.
customer_reviews.author: DAKB

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bedskirt. My only issue is that when the crib is placed on any other height setting other than newborn, it will drag the ground by quite a bit and require some tweaking. Other than that, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cvandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bed skirt that wasn't too bright and didn't have a design cause I didn't want it to clash with the walls or with the sheets that have a pretty busy design. This is the perfect dust ruffle! Very light pink and it is super girly, just what my daughter's crib needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure exactly what I was expecting - because the description says a tulle skirt, but it is more sheer than I thought it would be. The picture makes the crib skirt look more pink than it truly is. The quality is fine, just not quite the color indicated in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: SMG

customer_reviews.title: cute idea - ok execution
customer_reviews.text: i reallly wanted tulle for my baby's crib, and these were the only ones i could find at a price i wanted to spend. theyre a little cheaply made... not sure if i really like the way they look. also - they have a purple-y tinge to them.
customer_reviews.author: KOnlineShoppers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I had been eyeing one on another website for over $100 more than this one but decided to give this one a shot first. So thankful I did!! Great price and ultra feminine just like I was hoping!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Thin and see through
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look as full as the picture - the underlay is a cheap poly blend, and the tulle is more of a thin netting. It works for hiding storage underneath the crib, but isn't as nice as the pic made it look.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, not too short like most others. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: came as expected and fits the crib fine. a little long but better than too short :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, this is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Perfect touch for my daughter's crib. I ordered another one in white!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for our new Granddaughter whom is coming soon! Looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: lpitz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters crib and it adds a nice feminine touch! I was about the buy a very similar one from pottery barn for over $80 when I discovered this one. Just as cute and a quarter of the price! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Average....
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but really not anything fancy. Tulle is pretty flimsy, and very sheer. That being said, there is pretty minimal wear and tear with a crib skirt (we'll see how it holds up for a toddler bed).
customer_reviews.author: WiscoKate

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute crib skirt, Looks pretty in my daughter's ballerina themed nursery. Only reason for 4 stars is it slides down and you can see the top of it (the plain sheet looking part). Still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look as nice as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot longer than i thought it would be. Doesn't look as nice as I had hoped. It works and we kept it...but it needs to be used with a higher bed..not a crib.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Still really pretty for that perfect nursery right before baby
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quite fit our crib frame and was too long when we lowered the crib. Still really pretty for that perfect nursery right before baby comes
customer_reviews.author: Guy Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for half the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in my son's room. I ordered the P-B-K Kasey bedding but didn't want to pay their prices for everything. This matches the bumper great. It's also a nice length,and it's nice and full, unlike the P-B-K one I have for my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect affordable crib skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pale pink crib skirt for an affordable price! It fit my standard crib just right and I like that the corners are separated so that they fit nicely over the bars holding the crib mattress in place. This is a perfect, basic, what you see is what you get crib skirt. Very happy with mine!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: ... received another one as a gift) the Skirt was ADORABLE. It would have been a great addition to ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though I returned the Crib Skirt (because we received another one as a gift) the Skirt was ADORABLE. It would have been a great addition to the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Powell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The material and look is great, but it is quite a bit brighter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this bed skirt! I'm glad I ignored the negative reviews because it's exactly what it says it is a pink tule bed skirt. The color seems like a true pink to me despite the other reviews saying it looks more like a pink/purple.
customer_reviews.author: katie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters crib. And it looked beautiful like in the picture. And keeps well when washed. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: CristaW

customer_reviews.title: Don't even waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Very thin fabric and looks very cheap. For the price you could buy much higher quality than this. Don't even waste your time. I've seen better quality at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Webb

customer_reviews.title: The crib skirt is a beautiful color! It arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt is a beautiful color! It arrived on time, it DOES have the four sides (something I was worried about after reading some reviews on here stating it only had three). It is the perfect addition to my baby girls nursery! And for a great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Radley

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It just wasn't the look I was going for in my daughters nursery.
customer_reviews.author: NPeif

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. Maybe a few wrinkles but for price and quality that’s not a big deal bc you can iron out if need be.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: I got it in blue and is so cute. It fit a standard crib (I got a DaVInci KIlani). However, it was the perfect length if the crib was set to the highest setting, so unfortunately once my baby gets bigger and I want to lower the crib the skirt will sinch. Other than that, it's great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made...didn't like.
customer_reviews.text: This just looked really cheap. You could even see from across the room how cheap it looked. It wasn't what I was hoping it would be so back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light pink
customer_reviews.text: Used this to go in my daughters nursery. Didn't want anything to pink and this is perfect soft pink that matches perfectly with the gray and pink theme.
customer_reviews.author: D F

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib skirt! It added the girly effect that I was looking for. It is very sheer, but it seems like it as ruffled as it get get to fit between the railing and the crib frame. I'm very happy with this product but I would like to see this made out of a more solid material. And btw, mine came as described online.
customer_reviews.author: Meranda Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This perfectly fits our Million Dollar Baby crib! Goes very well with our various other bedding components!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet princess type crib skirt. Very generous. Just like it looks.
customer_reviews.author: judith axel

customer_reviews.title: Tulle Crib Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Ihave an antique iron crib that I wanted to use this for. It is the perfect length and size. Its beautiful on that bed. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anita Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but subtle
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something pink and girly but not overwhelming for my baby crib. This piece is it. I have it matched with chocolate furniture, but I'm confident it would look great with any color, especially white. It fits perfectly a standard crib size, and it's lightweight. It looks like a tutu without all the poof. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Cox

product_meta.title: Tadpoles Triple Layer Tulle Nursery Crib Skirt for Baby Boys or Girls, White, Crib-Size
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style:Triple Layer TulleThis delightfully glamorous triple-layer tulle bedskirt dresses up a bedroom in high style. Made from 100% polyester tulle, for easy-care, durability and color fastness. Generous 16" drop provides great coverage for under bed storage. Wrinkle-free and fade-resistant fabric allows skirt to have a long-life span and extreme durability. Skip the dry cleaners with this easy-care material. Just machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low heat. Skirt is available in both pink and white colorways, and in sizes twin, full, and crib/toddler. Coordinates with Tadpoles Tulle Curtain Panel and Tulle Window Valance for a complete room decor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Dress your little ballerina's crib in a tutu. Three layers of the prettiest petticoat-worthy pink tulle to make your daughter's crib dance. It is a beautiful and fashionable nursery décor to enliven a baby's room. This is fully washable and easy to care for. It is made of high quality fabrics.
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: 100% polyester panels; 80% polyester/ 20% cotton lining
DIMENSION: 28x52x16 inch drop, Fits All Standard Size Cribs
CARE: Machine wash, tumble dry on low heat
AVAILABLE IN: Pink or White colors, choose a white crib bed skirt or pink crib skirt to add glamour to your nursery
USES: Dress up your nursery crib in high style, suitable for girl’s bedroom, baby girl's nursery window valance, kitchen valance
